level.heading: Appointment of Director.
level.text: The Department of Public Health shall be under the supervision and direction of a Director who shall be appointed by the Mayor in accordance with subchapter X of Chapter 6 of Title 1, and subject to the advice and consent of the Council, as provided in ยง 1-523.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 9-182
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 9-182, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 7-151.
